events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The customer's request to return a purchased jacket and obtain a refund has been categorized under Refund.
Case has been assigned to customer service agent Olivia Martin for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about returning your jacket. I'd be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 7834521. The jacket hasn't been worn and is still in the original packaging as it was delivered.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly, and we'll process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on returning the item.
Iâ€™ve sent you the prepaid return label by email. Please return the jacket at your earliest convenience so we can finalize the refund.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Looking forward to the refund confirmation.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case has been closed, and please reach out anytime for further assistance.
